nodes.text: Vid-palaces were locations that showed vids.
One was located on Toprawa at 182 Riverside.

Havet Storm accepted an invitation to visit one during his time on the planet. At the time it was scheduled to show an ancient horror vid. When he visited, it was used to show a recruiting message for the Rebel Alliance.
Vid-palaces appear in the choose your own adventure book Jedi Dawn, written by Paul Blackthorne and published in 1993.
